document_data.name: Warrior's Woe
document_data.mainbody: '''''Warrior's Woe''''' was a musical work known in [[Cormyr]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Hisotry: In the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, [[Jasper (servant)|Jasper]] heard [[Diccon Picard]] playing a song on his [[fiddle]] and thought it was either ''Warrior's Woe'' or ''[[Red-haired Lad]]'', as he thought most fiddle songs sounded alike.
